text.page:
562
101-281b @#/ /'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo gros chen po sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par bya'o/ /tad+ya tha/ o~M pad+me pad+me de bai/ hi ne hi ne hi ne/ tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu/ hu le hu le hu le/ yu le yu le yu le/ pa le pa le pa le/ mu~M ts+tshi da na de/ b+hi na de b+han dz+we/ man de bra ma de/ di na ka ra swA hA/ blo gros chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /

563
101-282a 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed na/ lha'am/ lha mo'am/ klu'am/ klu mo'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma yin mo'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ nam mkha' lding mo'am/ mi'am ci'am/ mi'am ci mo'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ lto 'phye chen mo'am/ dri za'am/ dri za mo'am/ 'byung po'am/ 'byung mo'am/ grul bum mam/ grul bum mo'am/ sha za'am/ sha za mo'am/ gnon po'am/ gnon mo'am/ brjed byed dam/ brjed byed mo'am/ srin po'am/ srin mo'am/ phra man pho'am/ phra man mo'am/ mdangs 'phrog pho'am/ mdangs 'phrog mo'am/ lus srul po'am/ lus srul mo'am/ mi'am/ mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag klog par byed pa des lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ro/ /sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis srin po la sogs pa rnams bzlog pa'i phyir gsungs so/ /'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags rdzogs s+ho// /
